title: Pair of Earrings
description: Pair of gold earrings. Loop: a gold wire fastened into itself. To front face is soldered an openwork rosette enframing an oval setting (sets lost); below, an openwork bar of foliate design from which hangs 4 circular settings containing pointed garnets, and 4 glass beads, iridescent. On one earring all glass beads are missing.

museum_location.name: This item is not on view
